CatDescriptText: Mrs. John Hughes, 1864 Cliff Street, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 21, 1958, pg.5 with question: "Do you think that the city needs a fair housing ordinance?" answer reads: �Definitely. I really believe that the city needs one.�
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Mrs. John Hughes, wearing earrings, striped dress, and light colored sweater, holding eyeglasses, handbag, paper bag, and magazine with muscle man, standing in front of York Shop, Fifth Avenue, Downtown
